page.title: 09WASHINGTON-MULTI-PURPOSE CEN
page.content: The centre was opened in 1982. It is open for 18 hours a day and provides help for the following adults:- mentally handicapped, physically handicapped, elderly and a mental health group. The activities provided are :- pottery, woodwork, needlework, art/graphics, drama, gardening, sport (including horse riding and swimming) and numeracy/literacy basic skills. There is also therapy/relaxation provided for the mental health group. There are 15 instructors and 150 day places.Between 50 and 60 ancillary staff also provide a Meals on Wheels Service. Evening activities are also provided which involve the community and the people at the centre.
